Actions.Name: Short bow
Actions.Description: Nearby

Actions.Name: Black shield
Actions.Description: Add 1 shield token, may move **Close**

Actions.Name: Black Crossbow
Actions.Description: Nearby. Requires 2 actions to reload.

Actions.Name: Take aim
Actions.Description: Causes the next attack to have disadvantage to defend.

Special.Description: Frenzied! Has 3 actions per turn.
Wall climber, can walk on walls and ceiling.

Actions.Name: Death dealer
Actions.Description: Hits everyone **close**.

Actions.Name: Hook pole
Actions.Description: Hits diagonally. Hooks on a hit. Target can't move, and takes 1 wound per turn until Sack Man is stunned, killed or decides to release the target.

Special.Description: Toxic spores! Every time the matriarch takes a hit she releases spores in the air, that add one stun marker to anyone **close**.

Actions.Name: Controlling Gaze
Actions.Description: On hit add a stun marker

Special.Description: Small and fast, add disadvantage to hit
Terrifying! Cause terrified on hit.
Fly
Incorporeal, can phase through things, like iron bars

Actions.Name: Void whip
Actions.Description: *Binds* on hit, blocking move until a **Recover action**.

Actions.Name: Fade
Actions.Description: Add one **shield** and one **dodge** token. Move somewhere **close**.

Special.Description: Fly
Ignores morale, never flees, never dodges. Immune to PRE attacks.

Actions.Name: Consume a corpse
Actions.Description: and bloat, becoming a Red Weaver

Actions.Name: Cry of hunger
Actions.Description: (2 actions) Vibrates rapidly causing the ground around to shake. Causes a small earthquake, dropping parts of the ceiling on adventurers.

Actions.Name: Piercing light
Actions.Description: (2 actions) Flash of light, burns everyone **nearby**, including other enemies.

Special.Description: Fly
Ignores morale, never flees, never dodges. Immune to PRE attacks.
Unnatural presence, everyone nearby is **Nauseated** while around it. Any ration will spoil and water will become tainted.

Actions.Name: Silver Tentacles
Actions.Description: Nearby

Actions.Name: Pulse
Actions.Description: A wave of pain, causing 1 Presence wound to everyone *Close*, including diagonals.

Actions.Name: Unblinking Gaze
Actions.Description: Add 2 stun markers to target nearby

Actions.Name: Piercing red light
Actions.Description: (2 actions) Flash of light, burns everyone **nearby**, including other enemies. Add a stun marker to anyone *close* looking directly at it.

Special.Description: Too many of them, any damage is reduced to 1 wound

Actions.Name: Infest
Actions.Description: On critical one gets attached to target, causing 1 wound per turn until removed (1 action)

Special.Description: Small and  fast, add 1 difficulty to hit
For we are many, any damage is reduced to 2 wounds

Actions.Name: The cries of many
Actions.Description: Hits all adventurers **nearby**

Special.Description: Jumpy! If the rat is hit by an attack, it can **Move** immediately.
Explodes on death! Causing 2 wounds to everyone in the same tile, on a 2d! causes plague.

Actions.Name: Venomous Spit
Actions.Description: Causes nausea, adding a stun marker on 1d!

Special.Description: Immaterial, can move through walls, does not stop when moving out of the **adventurer**'s range, ignores shields.

Actions.Name: Soul nibble
Actions.Description: Add a **stun token** on hit.

Special.Description: Fly
Swarm! Cannot be harmed by regular weapons, only by fire or spells.
Ignores morale, never flees, never dodges. Immune to PRE attacks.
Surprisingly nutritive! Can be cooked in the camp phase as 1 ration. If you eat it become **Nauseated**.

Actions.Name: Bite
Actions.Description: If causes a wound *attach* to **adventurer**. Caused **Sleepy**. Causes **Bleeding** until removed

Actions.Name: Sticky Tongue
Actions.Description: On 2d! disarms the target **Nearby**.

Actions.Name: Toxic spit
Actions.Description: If caused at least 1 wound cause **intoxicated**.

Special.Description: Can't chage direction while moving.

Actions.Name: Grab
Actions.Description: Picks up a player character that can now use all actions to test STR to break free or take 1 wound and be immobilized for this turn.

Actions.Name: Eat
Actions.Description: Can only be used on a grabbed character.

Actions.Name: Bash
Actions.Description: On hit moves the player character to an adjacent tile.

Special.Description: Ignores morale, never flees, never dodges. Immune to PRE attacks.
Crawls, uses 2 actions when moving
No personal space, doesn't block other undead.
Ignores morale, never flees, never dodges. Immune to PRE attacks.
Pile on! Up to 3 of this type of monster can stack on the same tile.
Ignores morale, never flees, never dodges. Immune to PRE attacks.
Ignores morale, never flees, never dodges. Immune to PRE attacks.

Actions.Name: Nibble
Actions.Description: On a successful attack heal 1 wound

Actions.Name: Feast
Actions.Description: 2 actions. Heal all wounds, consumes a corpse and becomes an **Unsatiable Dead**.

Special.Description: Ignores morale, never flees, never dodges. Immune to PRE attacks.
Fast! Add a dodge token every turn.
Ignores morale, never flees, never dodges.

Actions.Name: Cursed Sea shanty
Actions.Description: 2 actions, cause 1 non-lethal PRE wound on everyone.

Special.Description: Ignores morale, never flees, never dodges. Immune to PRE attacks.
Acid pustules! Every time it takes one or more wounds, attack(STR 1) everyone **Close**.

Actions.Name: Agony
Actions.Description: Cries with cursed agony, hits everyone alive **Nearby**.

Special.Description: Ignores morale, never flees, never dodges. Immune to PRE attacks.
Hard to hit! All tests to hit this enemy are made with **disadvantage**.
Nimble! Ignores **combat movement penalty**
Tiny, 2 of them can occupy the same tile.
Ignores morale, never flees, never dodges. Immune to PRE attacks.
Hard to hit! All tests to hit this enemy are made with **disadvantage**.
Nimble! Ignores **combat movement penalty**
Tiny, 2 of them can occupy the same tile.

Actions.Name: Lunge
Actions.Description: 3 tiles. Gets attatched on hit, moving with target until hit.

Special.Description: Ethereal! Can only be hurt by magic, prayers or banish undead.
Hard to hit! Add a **dodge token** every turn.
Hard to hit! Add a **dodge token** every turn.
Scatter! When hit may move *close*

Actions.Name: Silken bola
Actions.Description: Add a stun marker to the target

Special.Description: Acid blood, on a !d6 it **ruins** the weapon used to attack this.
Big, but flexible. Occupies 2x2 tiles, but can fit in a 1x1 tile when it wants to.
Scatter! When hit may move *close*

Actions.Name: Silken bola
Actions.Description: Add a stun marker to the target

Actions.Name: Giant claw
Actions.Description: Add a stun marker to the target

Special.Description: Will to live! Add a shield token when receiving an attack that causes more than 2 wounds.

lines.Name: Unnatural regeneration
lines.Description: Heal 1 wound.

lines.Name: Roll
lines.Description: Move *close*, add 2 dodge tokens.

lines.Name: Cracked shield
lines.Description: Add 2 shield tokens, if tokens are used, the shield is gone.

lines.Name: Wooden shield
lines.Description: Add 2 shield tokens.

lines.Name: Dodge
lines.Description: (2 actions) Add 2 dodge tokens.

lines.Name: Phase out
lines.Description: Becomes incorporeal, add 2 dodge tokens and move 2 tiles.

lines.Name: Infectious bite
lines.Description: Causes **Plagued** on **1d!**.

lines.Name: Lunge
lines.Description: Moves **Close** to the target and attack

lines.Name: Poisonous Bite
lines.Description: On hit causes **Nausea**

lines.Name: Chew Armor
lines.Description: Always destroys 1 armor point.

lines.Name: Ram
lines.Description: Moves 3 tiles, pushing whomever is in the way in a straight line. Causes 1 wound if hits a wall.
Armor points
**Disadvantage** allows the *GM* to choose **one** dice from the test or check to reroll. The *GM* chooses to use old or new value.
**Advantage** allows the player to choose **one** dice from the test or check to reroll. The new value must be used.
**Quick items** can be used on the exploration phase without spending a turn, or in combat, using 1 action.
**Slow items** cannot be used in combat, using them in the exploration phase will spend 1 turn.
**Camp items** may only be used during the camping phase or interlude.
An event that happened a century ago in **Blacksalt** isle that causes all the dead to come back to life when not properly buried.
A combat round is done when everyone involved had their turn.
The player's character
Save the trees!
A token to be placed on an **adventurer** or **enemy** that forces spending a **recover action** to remove it
A token to be placed on an **adventurer** or **enemy** that allows the owner to spend it to chose and reroll attack dice when defending
A token to be placed on an **adventurer** or **enemy** that allows the owner to spend it to chose and reroll attack dice when defending
Yulak is the god of purity, fire and punishment
Worth meager 1d6 silver coins.
Worth of 2 + 2d6 silver coins
Worth 3 X 2d6 silver coins
Worth a lot, 5 X 3d6 silver coins
Very expensive, sells for 10 X 4d6 silver coins
Rolling 2 or more 6s in a test
1 tile, include diagonals.
6 tiles
12 tiles
more than 12 tiles

Step.name: Tossed in the Pit
Step.description: Rejected by everyone, even by death.

Step.name: Feral Kid
Step.description: Raised by animals in the forest.

Step.name: Born in Exile
Step.description: Raised far away from civilization.

Step.name: Battleborn
Step.description: Born in a army during a raging war, forged in violence.

Step.name: Street Urchin
Step.description: Orphan, raised by other kids.

Step.name: City Kid
Step.description: Grew up amidst the chaos of a big city.

Step.name: Caravan Child
Step.description: Born in a trading caravan, before walking you learned to haggle.

Step.name: Clergy Bastard
Step.description: Born by a sinful union, learned guilt and prayer before walking.

Step.name: Occultist’s Apprentice
Step.description: Raised by an occultist and trained in the arcane arts since a kid.

Step.name: Blue Blood
Step.description: Born in a rich family that eventually lost everything.

Step.name: Born of a dark prophecy
Step.description: No one knows where you came from, only that it's bad.

Step.name: Deserter Knight
Step.description: To die for honor was never something you aspired to.

Step.name: Squire
Step.description: They said one day you would be a knight. You believed that.

Step.name: Physician
Step.description: Not many people know how to actually heal someone, you do.

Step.name: Temple Worker
Step.description: You worked hard in the temples, body and mind.

Step.name: Charlatan
Step.description: Outsmarting and taking advantage was your specialty.

Step.name: Brigand
Step.description: Joined a gang that robs people on the mountains and forests.

Step.name: Common Thief
Step.description: Stealing, lying and hiding.

Step.name: Craftsman
Step.description: Your hands know how to hammer an iron and how to sew leather without you even thinking.

Step.name: Cook
Step.description: While there are hungry people, you will always have a job.

Step.name: Occultist
Step.description: One that dares to touch the unknown, a magic user.

Step.name: False Prophet
Step.description: It's hard not to believe in yourself when so many believe in what you say.

Step.name: Forced to work in a circus
Step.description: The things you've seen behind the curtains changed you forever.

Step.name: Afflicted by the plague
Step.description: You had to resort to treatment many would consider... unnatural.

Step.name: A murderous impulse
Step.description: Something was wrong with you, but you are better now. Unlike your victims.

Step.name: In debt with a loan shark
Step.description: You got the money that you needed, but it cost more than you expected.

Step.name: Lost to the night pleasures
Step.description: One party blended into the next, until the day came and your young years were gone.

Step.name: Enlisted in a war
Step.description: Fought in the losing side of a glorious war.

Step.name: Went to jail
Step.description: By reasons just or unjust, you ended up locked away.

Step.name: Enslaved
Step.description: Taken by force and worked endlessly until the day you escaped.

Step.name: Lost everything in a disaster
Step.description: Whatever your family had now lies in ashes.

Step.name: Lover's revenge
Step.description: Too many lovers and no honesty. One way or another, they made you regret it.

Step.name: Caged by a powerful wizard
Step.description: You witnessed both enlightenment and madness.

Step.name: Lost everything and everyone
Step.description: When you have lost everything, *Blacksalt* can be a fresh start or a quick end.

Step.name: Plagued loved one
Step.description: Rumors of a panacea, a cure for all diseases, lies in *Blacksalt*.

Step.name: An unexplainable impulse
Step.description: Something calls you there; when you sleep, you see yourself in *Blacksalt*.

Step.name: Revenge
Step.description: You've been terribly wronged. You will never forgive and never forget.

Step.name: Fame and riches
Step.description: You are destined to great things, at least that's what you believe.
Step.effect: #Cape with your coat of arms(+1 AP)

Step.name: An impossible quest
Step.description: Your lord sent you on a quest to find something in *Blacksalt*, you have no chance.

Step.name: Redemption
Step.description: You can no longer live with the things you've done, maybe you can redeem yourself in *Blacksalt*.

Step.name: Zealous Fury
Step.description: *Blacksalt* must be cleansed of any diabolical presence, no matter the cost.

Step.name: Amnesia
Step.description: You don't know how you got here. You just woke up here one day, now you are searching for the truth.
Step.effect: #Book with notes in an unknown language

Step.name: An Heir
Step.description: Your family is waiting for you, you will come back for them. But first you need to score enough money.

Step.name: A Soul Sold
Step.description: You are going to hell, but some say that in the depths of *Blacksalt* one can reclaim their soul.

choose_effect.effect: #Backpack, #Spear (STR 3+1B), #Small metal shield, #Padded armor (2 AP), #2d6 silver coins.
#Bag, #2 short swords (STR 2+1), #Leather armor (1 AP),#Climbing tools, #Stolen golden icon, #1d6 silver coins
#Backpack, #Dagger (STR 1+3P), #Reinforced hood and vest (1 AP), #Lock-picking tools, #Ud6 sleeping darts, #3d6 counterfeit coins
#Backpack, #Ud10 throwing hatchets (DEX 1X+1), #Animal bones for crafting, #Ud4 trapping kit, #Cloth tunic, #1d6 silver coins
#Cane (STR 1+1), #Alchemic tools, #Tattered trench coat, #Old tome (grimoire), #3d6 silver coins, #1 gold coin
#Flail (STR 2X+2), #Forbidden scriptures (holy symbol), #Leather trench coat (1 AP), #3d6 silver coins
#War hammer (STR 1P+3), #Ancient talisman (holy symbol), #Ud6 flasks of holy water, #Thick cloak (1 AP), #3d6 silver coins
#Notched whip (DEX 1R+2B), #Torture equipment, rope, #Book of sins (holy symbol), #Tattered cloak, #1d6 coins

lines.name: water
lines.description: 2 units of water can fit one slot

lines.name: cloth
lines.description: A piece of cloth, can be used as improvised bandages.

lines.name: camping supplies
lines.description: Basic supplies for making a fire and cooking.

lines.name: bandages
lines.description: A pack of 3 bandages, used to stop bleeding

lines.name: drawing tools
lines.description: Some papers and drawing tools, can be used to draw maps or write scrolls, Ud8

lines.name: common clothes
lines.description: Nothing fancy.

lines.name: 3 meter pole
lines.description: Good for looking for traps. (Big)

lines.name: iron spikes
lines.description: For fixing doors open and making sure things stay in place. Ud8

lines.name: canteen
lines.description: For holding water and other liquids.

lines.name: ration
lines.description: Removes the *hungry* affliction. If cooked during camp, can feed 2 (or 3) adventurers (if someone has the *cooking* skill)

lines.name: torches
lines.description: A pack of 2 torches. Lights the way **nearby** for Ud4 decays.

lines.name: candles
lines.description: A pack of 6 candles. Lights the way **close** for Ud6 decays.

lines.name: oil
lines.description: For refueling the lantern

lines.name: rope
lines.description: 10 meters of rope

lines.name: special ration
lines.description: Tea, coffee or hot chocolate. Does not remove the *hungry* affliction.

lines.name: sewing tools
lines.description: Repairs one armor point from any light armor. Ud8 uses.

lines.name: small bag
lines.description: For extra inventory space.

lines.name: holy water
lines.description: Can be thrown at undead for DEX 2PR, Ud6 uses.

lines.name: climbing gear
lines.description: 15m of rope with a hook, spikes and other safety utensils for Ud6 climbs.

lines.name: Waterskin
lines.description: A large container for holding water and other liquids.

lines.name: lockpicking tools
lines.description: For opening simple locks. Ud20 uses

lines.name: trapping kit
lines.description: For making and disarming simple traps. Can build Ud6 traps. Stepping on a trap causes 4 wounds and immobilizes the target. Getting free requires 1 turn and a strength test.

lines.name: lantern
lines.description: Lights the way **nearby** for Ud8 decays. Uses oil. Quick to turn on and off, slow to refuel.

lines.name: first aid kit
lines.description: Heals one STR or DEX wound. Ud6 uses

lines.name: medical supply
lines.description: Pack of 2. Used in camp for healing 1 wound.

lines.name: healing tonic
lines.description: Heals one INT or DEX wound. Ud4 uses

lines.name: wine
lines.description: Heals one PRE wound and removes *Parched*. Ud4, causes *Nauseated* if you drink too much.

lines.name: leatherworker's toolkit
lines.description: Repairs one armor point from any medium or light armor. Ud6 uses.

lines.name: compass
lines.description: Useful for not getting lost.

lines.name: small pouch
lines.description: For extra inventory space.

lines.name: backpack
lines.description: For extra inventory space.

lines.name: exorcism book
lines.description: One extra die when *banishing undead*.

lines.name: shovel or pickaxe
lines.description: Good for digging around

lines.name: mechanics toolkit
lines.description: For fixing, assembling and disassembling mechanical devices.

lines.name: ashes of insight
lines.description: Identify a single magic item (slow) or reveals something invisible (quick)

lines.name: armourer supplies
lines.description: Repairs one armor point from any armor. Ud6 uses.

lines.name: holy symbol
lines.description: Used to perform miracles.

lines.name: wine of Yoros
lines.description: Liquid courage. Heals one PRE and one INT wound.

lines.name: pack mule
lines.description: Useful for carrying items on long journeys. Has 10 inventory spaces, requires 2 rations per day or grass.

lines.name: fine jewelry
lines.description: Made of precious materials, not very useful in a dungeon.

lines.name: living ashes
lines.description: +1 damage to a weapon during expedition, Ud4 uses

lines.name: alchemic kit
lines.description: Can be used for modifying, identifying and making potions

lines.name: spell book
lines.description: Simple spell book, holds 3 spells

lines.name: panacea
lines.description: Cures any disease or affliction. Heals one wound in each attribute.

lines.name: holy relic
lines.description: A relic retrieved from the grave of a saint.

lines.Name: Flail
lines.Special Rules: Ignore shield tokens. If you miss, roll a d6, on a 1 you hit yourself with 1 wound.

lines.Name: Quarterstaff
lines.Special Rules: On hit add one [dodge token]{.tip} to the attacker.

lines.Name: Sacrificial dagger
lines.Special Rules: If all damage is reduced roll a d6, on 1 it breaks.

lines.Name: Notched whip
lines.Special Rules: If the enemy has no armor, add a **stun token** to the enemy. Can hit diagonally.

lines.Name: Short Spear
lines.Special Rules: 2 hands. Can be used with 1 hand, but reduces the attack roll by 1 dice. Can hit diagonally.

lines.Name: Long Spear
lines.Special Rules: **2 tiles**. 2 hands. Can be used with 1 hand, but reduces the attack roll by 1 dice. Can hit diagonally. When hitting tiles close use (-STR 1+1).

lines.Name: War hammer
lines.Special Rules: If you hit roll a d6, on a 6 add a **stun token** to the enemy.

lines.Name: Throwing hatchet
lines.Special Rules: **Nearby**. You can use STR to hit but if you do, flip a coin, on heads it hits with the handle, causing no damage. Ignores **shield tokens**. You can use STR to melee with no downsides.

lines.Name: Heavy cape
lines.Special Effect: Can be worn with other armor

lines.Name: Gambeson
lines.Special Effect: Can be worn under heavy armor

lines.Name: Chainmail
lines.Special Effect: Can't be used against impact attacks

lines.Name: Gothic plate armor
lines.Special Effect: Occupy 2 slots. Reduces **dexterity** die by one.

lines.Name: Soldier helmet
lines.Special Effect: Always breaks 1 and only 1 AP on use.

lines.name: Buckler
lines.special effect: Can be used on the same hand of an equipped weapon.

lines.name: Small wooden shield
lines.special effect: Breaks on 2d! when using one or more shield tokens.

lines.name: Wooden shield
lines.special effect: Breaks on 2d! when using one or more shield tokens. Can't dodge when equipped.

lines.name: Leather shield
lines.special effect: Breaks on 1d! when using one or more shield tokens. Can't dodge when equipped.

lines.name: Tower shield
lines.special effect: Big, occupy 2 slots. Can't dodge when equipped.

lines.name: Spiked shield
lines.special effect: Causes 1 wound when blocking a melee attack.
